dct_description_sm: Title in Latin. California still unlabelled.

Map of Mexico and Central America, with southern tip of California shown. Included because later states of the map have it labelled as an island.Title cartouche as plaque with brick base and top (bottom left).
Issued in: Geographiae Universalis / Pierre Duvall. -- Nuremberg : [Published by Johann Hoffman], 1681.
